channel.title: Can some 1 tell me how to make a no-ip or servegame server?
channel.description:
Plz help me! im in desperate need! i have tried for senturies but still failed!
PLZ! write!
P.S: If somthings wrong whit topic then fix it plz! (tellin all mods)

item.title: Can some 1 tell me how to make a no-ip or servegame server?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Here’s a summary of what you need to do. Go to no-ip.com and then create a No-IP. Then, go to your Router’s IP and Port Forward to whatever Port your Server is on. Then, viola! It works!

Read full topic
item.source: Can some 1 tell me how to make a no-ip or servegame server?
